Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Lynchburg in 1971...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1973, off Chet Steadman (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1973, off David Hans (Ash)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (UBA) on 6/27/1974...
Traded from Lynchburg to Boston (UBA) on 4/16/1978 (Going to LYN: 2B C. Arispe, P L. Rios. Going to PIL: 3B R. Dorn)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1978, hitting .440 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Gashouse on 10/6/1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/22/1979 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pontiac, driving in 4 runs on 8/31/1979...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1980, hitting .368 with 6 HR, 18 RBI...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Diablo on 7/21/1981 (Going to DIA: 1B R. Dorn. Going to PIL: 3B S. Wesson, 1B E. Aguiar)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Boston (UBA) on 4/26/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1982, hitting .524 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston (UBA) on 6/28/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1987, hitting .579 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/18/1988, off Christopher Headrick (LYN)...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/7/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $1,750,000 per year...
